artist: Artist: David Last; Publisher: Artichoke Yink Press
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, letterpress and a photomechanical illustration of a curving dotted line that follows the contour of a hairline with sideburns, printed in color offset lithography on wove paper covers; pp.
medium: Color and black-and-white offset lithography, letterpress; bound volume
title: Thirty Two Guys with Sideburns
